Simple Blog Template

Simple Blog Template is a basic blog homepage HTML starter template forked from Startbootstrap Blog Home.

Getting Started

To begin using this template, choose one of the following options to get started:

  • Clone the repo: git clone https://github.com/earlbread/simple-blog-template.git
  • Fork the repo

Creator

Simple Blog Template was created by and is maintained by Seunghun Lee.

  • https://linkedin.com/in/waydi1
  • https://github.com/earlbread

Simple Blog Template is based on the Bootstrap framework created by Mark Otto and Jacob Thorton, and forked from Startbootstrap Blog Home.
